snippet.title: Roguely Trailer - Fantasy Action Roguelite Top-Down Shooter
snippet.description:
Roguely is a fantasy themed top-down shooter pixel art action roguelite with some bullet hell thrown in. 
Get it now on Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1542820/Roguely/

Fight and dodge your way through the randomly generated levels to rescue your friends. Find upgrades along the way and save up arcane fragments for permanent blessings from the gods.
